snippet.title: Skybinder Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Skybinder is a VR game that feels so good to play. It's like solving a sudoku by popping bubble wrap.

Description: Get in flow, unlock new creatures, and dive into the world of Skybinder.
- Connect dots to solve increasingly detailed 3D puzzles
- Create an enormous whale and a cheeky chicken, triangle by triangle
- Discover which dots among dozens connect to reveal a king cobra
Activate your mind in this meditative game that soothes and stimulates. Skybinder is a puzzle anyone can play, but few can master. Can you become the Skybinder?

Available now on Oculus Quest: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/3767076743418568/
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1679820/Skybinder/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SkybinderVR
Website: makuxr.com/skybinder
